verses.verse: לְדָוִ֡ד <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David אֵ֘לֶ֤יךָ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֶקְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> Unto thee will I cry צוּרִי֮ <S%H6697><s%> my rock אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֶּחֱרַ֪שׁ <S%H2790><s%> to me lest [if] thou be silent מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> do תֶּֽחֱשֶׁ֥ה <S%H2790><s%> not be deaf מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי <S%H4911><s%> to me I become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> who י֥וֹרְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> like them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> into the pit

שְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice תַּ֭חֲנוּנַי <S%H8469><s%> of my supplications בְּשַׁוְּעִ֣י <S%H7768><s%> when I cry אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> toward בְּנָשְׂאִ֥י <S%H5375><s%> unto thee when I lift up יָ֝דַ֗י <S%H3027><s%> my hands אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward דְּבִ֥יר <S%H1687><s%> oracle קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H6944><s%> toward thy holy

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּמְשְׁכֵ֣נִי <S%H4900><s%> Draw me not away עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with רְשָׁעִים֮ <S%H7563><s%> with the wicked וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> who פֹּ֪עֲלֵ֫י <S%H6466><s%> and with the workers אָ֥וֶן <S%H205><s%> of iniquity דֹּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1696><s%> which speak שָׁ֭לוֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with רֵֽעֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H7453><s%> to their neighbours וְ֝רָעָ֗ה <S%H7451><s%> but mischief בִּלְבָבָֽם׃ <S%H3824><s%> [is] in their hearts

תֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> Give לָהֶ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> according כְּפָעֳלָם֮ <S%H6467><s%> them according to their deeds וּכְרֹ֪עַ <S%H7455><s%> and according to the wickedness מַֽעַלְלֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <S%H4611><s%> of their endeavours כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> them after the work יְ֭דֵיהֶם <S%H3027><s%> of their hands תֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> give לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like הָשֵׁ֖ב <S%H7725><s%> render גְּמוּלָ֣ם <S%H1576><s%> to them their desert לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָבִ֡ינוּ <S%H995><s%> Because they regard אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פְּעֻלֹּ֣ת <S%H6468><s%> not the works יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> nor the operation יָדָ֑יו <S%H3027><s%> of his hands יֶ֝הֶרְסֵ֗ם <S%H2040><s%> he shall destroy וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִבְנֵֽם׃ <S%H1129><s%> them and not build them up

בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because שָׁ֝מַע <S%H8085><s%> because he hath heard ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <S%H8469><s%> of my supplications

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עֻזִּ֥י <S%H5797><s%> [is] my strength וּמָגִנִּי֮ <S%H4043><s%> and my shield בּ֤וֹ בָטַ֥ח <S%H982><s%> trusted לִבִּ֗י <S%H3820><s%> my heart וְֽנֶ֫עֱזָ֥רְתִּי <S%H5826><s%> in him and I am helped וַיַּעֲלֹ֥ז <S%H5937><s%> greatly rejoiceth לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> therefore my heart וּֽמִשִּׁירִ֥י <S%H7892><s%> and with my song אֲהוֹדֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H3034><s%> will I praise

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עֹֽז־ <S%H5797><s%> [is] their strength לָ֑מוֹ וּמָ֘ע֤וֹז <S%H4581><s%> strength יְשׁוּע֖וֹת <S%H3444><s%> and he [is] the saving מְשִׁיח֣וֹ <S%H4899><s%> of his anointed הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

הוֹשִׁ֤יעָה ׀ <S%H3467><s%> Save אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמֶּ֗ךָ <S%H5971><s%> thy people וּבָרֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> and bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5159><s%> thine inheritance וּֽרְעֵ֥ם <S%H7462><s%> feed וְ֝נַשְּׂאֵ֗ם <S%H5375><s%> them also and lift them up עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for הָעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever
